item.title: Edit sprite editor files
item.dc:creator: @Trax88 Trax88
item.description:
@Trax88 wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:8, topic:329529”]No its not use this path in your .bat file

set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.8.0\bin[/quote]
weird, it still says that ANT_HOME is incorrect :S

Huh got it work. Just had to dl older version apache-ant-1.7.0
1.8.0 dont work, idk why… i leave this question for smart ppls

Tnx for every1 who bothered hemself to help me out

item.title: Edit sprite editor files
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
set JAVA_HOME=SET YOUR JAVA PATH HERE
cls
ant
pause
@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin
ant editor
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Edit sprite editor files
item.dc:creator: @Trax88 Trax88
item.description:
@Trax88 wrote:

Hey any1 can help me with that? I’m kinda new on this work but i’d like to learn something on this.
So… how should i edit those .bat files, that they will keep working.

[code]
compile.bat

@echo off
cls
ant
pause[/code]

[code]run_editor.bat

@echo off
ant editor
pause[/code]

Read full topic
